name: Slime Sweeper (Nyamah)
description:
Move your slime through the grid, push walls and attack enemies with WASD.

You have a time limit. Every action you perform has an extra time cost. When the time counter reaches 0, you lose.

Your goal is to find an opening in the walls and escape. Most levels already have an opening (marked with a yellow arrow). Others require you to push and crack walls to find the way.

Hope you have fun!
